transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker A: Hello?
Speaker B: Yeah, hello, I'm actually with Elizabeth here.
Speaker C: Yes, speaking.
Speaker B: Hello Eliza? Rishabh, it's this way. Calling you from ambitious students.
Speaker D: Calling from where?
Speaker E: Sorry, from a.m. the student Elizabeth.
Speaker F: This call is regarding your UCL accommodation.
Speaker C: Yes.
Speaker B: So we have just received a payment.
Speaker F: For London East Paddington City View.
Speaker D: A payment from.
Speaker F: Paddington city view of 259 pounds.
Speaker D: Yes, that's a deposit on the location.
Speaker E: Yeah, yeah, just wanted to confirm here.
Speaker F: Which payment method that you wish to proceed with. There are two payment methods currently. One is you can pay the rent in four or five installment and the other one is that you can pay the rent of current.
Speaker E: So okay, which payment method did you.
Speaker F: Want to go for?
Speaker D: Hang on, do I want to pay in instalments or what?
Speaker A: Upfront.
Speaker D: Does it cost more to pay in instalments?
Speaker A: Is there any interest on that?
Speaker B: The payment method will be same.
Speaker F: The amount will be same.
Speaker C: Okay.
Speaker A: The payment amount will be the same.
Speaker D: Is there an option for how many.
Speaker A: Instalments you do it in or is it just eight?
Speaker E: I can do max to max, four.
Speaker B: To five installments if that's okay with you.
Speaker A: I'm not sure, I don't.
Speaker E: You can do something here.
Speaker C: Could I pass you over, Could I.
Speaker D: Possibly pass you over to my mum who's going to be paying for the accommodation because.
Speaker C: Okay, I'll pass you over.
Speaker D: Thank you.
Speaker E: Okay, I'll do one thing, I'll do one thing here.
Speaker F: Hello.
Speaker C: Hi.
Speaker F: Yeah, hi.
Speaker B: Am I audible to you now?
Speaker G: Yes you are. It's just a. It's a little bit of a bad line but it's okay.
Speaker B: Okay.
Speaker E: Is it fine if I connect you on WhatsApp?
Speaker F: I guess there was. The line would be smooth over there.
Speaker G: Yes, you can connect from WhatsApp.
Speaker C: That's fine.
Speaker G: What do have a chat.
Speaker E: I will give you WhatsApp.
Speaker G: Call me on WhatsApp.
Speaker B: I will give you WhatsApp.
Speaker G: Okay, cool.
